1.name: Lolita
1.description: A middle-aged college professor becomes infatuated with a fourteen-year-old nymphet.

2.name: To Kill a Mockingbird
2.description: Atticus Finch, a lawyer in the Depression-era South, defends a black man against an undeserved rape charge, and his children against prejudice.

3.name: Lawrence of Arabia
3.description: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

4.name: How the West Was Won
4.description: A family saga covering several decades of Westward expansion in the nineteenth century - including the Gold Rush, the Civil War, and the building of the railroads.

5.name: Dr. No
5.description: A resourceful British government agent seeks answers in a case involving the disappearance of a colleague and the disruption of the American space program.

6.name: Cleo from 5 to 7
6.description: Cleo, a singer and hypochondriac, becomes increasingly worried that she might have cancer while awaiting test results from her doctor.

7.name: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
7.description: A senator, who became famous for killing a notorious outlaw, returns for the funeral of an old friend and tells the truth about his deed.

8.name: What Ever Happened to Baby Jane?
8.description: A former child star torments her paraplegic sister in their decaying Hollywood mansion.

9.name: The Longest Day
9.description: The events of D-Day, told on a grand scale from both the Allied and German points of view.

10.name: The L-Shaped Room
10.description: A single, pregnant woman moves into a London boarding house where she meets a group of fellow misfits.

11.name: Cape Fear
11.description: A lawyer's family is stalked by a man he once helped put in jail.

12.name: Mutiny on the Bounty
12.description: In 1787, British ship Bounty leaves Portsmouth to bring a cargo of bread-fruit from Tahiti but the savage on-board conditions imposed by Captain Bligh trigger a mutiny led by officer Fletcher Christian.

13.name: The Manchurian Candidate
13.description: A former prisoner of war is brainwashed as an unwitting assassin for an international Communist conspiracy.

14.name: The Music Man
14.description: Harold Hill poses as a boys' band leader to con naive Iowa townsfolk.

15.name: Harakiri
15.description: An elder ronin samurai arrives at a feudal lord's home and requests an honorable place to commit suicide. But when the ronin inquires about a younger samurai who arrived before him things take an unexpected turn.

16.name: Experiment in Terror
16.description: A man with an asthmatic voice telephones bank clerk Kelly Sherwood at home and coerces her into helping him steal a large sum from her bank.

17.name: Ivan's Childhood
17.description: In WW2, twelve year old Soviet orphan Ivan Bondarev works for the Soviet army as a scout behind the German lines and strikes a friendship with three sympathetic Soviet officers.

18.name: The Miracle Worker
18.description: The story of Anne Sullivan's struggle to teach the blind and deaf Helen Keller how to communicate.

19.name: The Exterminating Angel
19.description: The guests at an upper-class dinner party find themselves unable to leave.

20.name: Vivre Sa Vie
20.description: Twelve episodic tales in the life of a Parisian woman and her slow descent into prostitution.

21.name: Panic in Year Zero
21.description: A family of four leaves Los Angeles for a camping trip just before a nuclear bomb destroys the city. As lawlessness prevails, the father must fight to keep his family alive.

22.name: Jules and Jim
22.description: Decades of a love triangle concerning two friends and an impulsive woman.

23.name: Carnival of Souls
23.description: After a traumatic accident, a woman becomes drawn to a mysterious abandoned carnival.

24.name: Gypsy
24.description: Based on the Broadway hit about the life and times of burlesque dancer Gypsy Rose Lee and her aggressive stage mother, Mama Rose.

25.name: Two for the Seesaw
25.description: Jerry Ryan is wandering aimlessly around New York, having given up his law career in Nebraska when his wife asked for a divorce. He meets up with Gittel Mosca, an impoverished dancer from ...                See full summary »

26.name: Hatari!
26.description: A group of men trap wild animals in Africa and sell them to zoos before the arrival of a female wildlife photographer threatens to change their ways.

27.name: L'Eclisse
27.description: A young woman meets a vital young man, but their love affair is doomed because of the man's materialistic nature.

28.name: The Trial
28.description: An unassuming office worker is arrested and stands trial, but he is never made aware of his charges.

29.name: Lonely Are the Brave
29.description: A fiercely independent cowboy gets himself locked up in prison to escape with an old friend.

30.name: Boccaccio '70
30.description: Four directors tell tales of Eros fit for a 1970s Decameron. Working-class lovers, Renzo and Luciana, marry but must hide it from her employer; plus, they need a room of their own. A ...                See full summary »

31.name: Sanjuro
31.description: A crafty samurai helps a young man and his fellow clansmen save his uncle, who has been framed and imprisoned by a corrupt superintendent.

32.name: Knife in the Water
32.description: On their way to a sailing trip, an aging husband and wife invite along an emphatic young hitchhiker out of sheer patronization.

33.name: Hell Is for Heroes
33.description: Small squad must hold off German attack.

34.name: Ride the High Country
34.description: An ex-union soldier is hired to transport gold from a mining community through dangerous territory. But what he doesn't realize is that his partner and old friend is plotting to double-cross him.

35.name: King Kong vs. Godzilla
35.description: A pharmaceutical company captures King Kong and brings him to Japan, where he escapes from captivity and battles a recently released Godzilla.

36.name: The Traitors
36.description: Espionage story telling how British and American security agents outwit ruthless and cunning traitors trying to steal secret project plans.

37.name: The Brain That Wouldn't Die
37.description: A doctor experimenting with transplant techniques keeps his girlfriend's head alive when she is decapitated in a car crash, then goes hunting for a new body.

38.name: That Touch of Mink
38.description: A rich businessman and a young woman are attracted to each other, but he only wants an affair while she wants to save herself for marriage.

39.name: Baron Prásil
39.description: The outrageous Baron Munchausen tells of his many adventures, from meeting the Man in the Moon to defeating a Turkish army all by himself.

40.name: Long Day's Journey Into Night
40.description: At the end of a long and hot summer day, members of one family gather in a large house. Everyone has something painful and offensive to say, and their silence is even worse.

41.name: The 300 Spartans
41.description: A small Army of Greeks spearheaded by three hundred Spartans do battle with the whole invading Persian Army.

42.name: Girls! Girls! Girls!
42.description: When he finds out his boss is retiring to Arizona, a sailor has to find a way to buy the Westwind, a boat that he and his father built. He is also caught between two women: insensitive club singer Robin and sweet Laurel.

43.name: The Intruder
43.description: A man in a gleaming white suit comes to a small Southern town on the eve of integration. He calls himself a social reformer. But what he does is stir up trouble--trouble he soon finds he can't control.

44.name: Days of Wine and Roses
44.description: An alcoholic marries a young woman, whom he systematically addicts to booze so they can share his "passion" together.

45.name: Jack the Giant Killer
45.description: A farmboy turned knight must protect a princess from the schemes of an evil wizard.

46.name: Strongroom
46.description: During a bank robbery, the manager and a cashier are locked in the strongroom while the crooks escape. Later when the gang realise that their plan to release the pair has gone wrong, they ...                See full summary »

47.name: Sweet Bird of Youth
47.description: Drifter Chance Wayne returns to his hometown after many years of trying to make it in the movies. Arriving with him is a faded film star he picked up along the way, Alexandra Del Lago. ...                See full summary »

48.name: Walk on the Wild Side
48.description: The lives of a group of women in a New Orleans bordello.

49.name: Birdman of Alcatraz
49.description: A surly convicted murderer held in permanent isolation redeems himself when he becomes a renowned bird expert.

50.name: The Bellboy and the Playgirls
50.description: This Bellboy is after more than just big tips.
